get.summary: Get info about the v2 model reference API
get.description:
Get information about the v2 model reference API.

This is the v2 model reference API, which uses the new format established by horde_model_reference.

get.summary: Get all v2 model reference names
get.description:
Get all available v2 model reference category names.

Returns a list of all model categories that have v2 format references available.

GetModelsByCategory.description: Each category name can be used to retrieve all models in that category.

get.summary: Get a specific v2 model reference by category name
get.description:
Get all models in a specific v2 model reference category.

Returns the complete v2 format JSON for the requested category.

additionalProperties.description: A model record conforming to one of the category-specific schemas

GetSingleModel.description: Get a specific model from this category.

CreateModelInCategory.description: Create a new model in this category.

404.description: Model category not found or empty

get.summary: Get a specific model by category and name
get.description:
Get a specific model by category and name.

Args:
    model_category_name: The model reference category (e.g., image_generation).
    model_name: The name of the model within the category.
    manager: The model reference manager dependency.

Returns:
    JSONResponse: The model record data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if category or model not found.

GetAllModelsInCategory.description: Get all models in this category.

404.description: Model category or model not found

put.summary: Update an existing model in v2 format
put.description:
Update an existing model in v2 format.

⚠️ **This endpoint is only available when `canonical_format='v2'` in PRIMARY mode.**

The model must already exist in the specified category. Use POST to create new models.

- Preserves original `created_at` and `created_by` metadata
- Updates `updated_at` timestamp

schema.description: A model record conforming to one of the category-specific schemas
schema.title: New Model Record

schema.description: A model record conforming to one of the category-specific schemas
schema.title: Response Update V2 Model

GetAllModelsInCategory.description: Retrieve all models in the category including the updated one.

CreateModelInCategory.description: Create another model in the same category.

404.description: Model not found (use POST to create)

503.description: Service unavailable (v2 canonical mode required)

delete.description:
Delete a model from a v2 model reference category.

⚠️ **This endpoint is only available when `canonical_format='v2'` in PRIMARY mode.**

Permanently removes the specified model from the category.

GetRemainingModels.description: Retrieve all remaining models in the category after deletion.

CreateModelInCategory.description: Create a new model in the same category.

404.description: Model not found in the specified category

503.description: Service unavailable (v2 canonical mode required)

post.summary: Create a new image generation model in v2 format
post.description:
Create a new image generation model in v2 format.

⚠️ **This endpoint is only available when `canonical_format='v2'` in PRIMARY mode.**

The model name in the request body must not already exist in the image generation category.

GetCreatedImageModel.description: Retrieve all image generation models including the newly created one.

UpdateCreatedImageModel.description: Update the newly created image generation model.

DeleteCreatedImageModel.description: Delete the newly created image generation model.

409.description: Model already exists (use PUT to update)

503.description: Service unavailable (v2 canonical mode required)

get.summary: Get statistics for a model category
get.description:
Get comprehensive statistics for a model reference category.

Returns aggregate metrics including:
- Total model counts (overall, NSFW, SFW)
- Baseline distribution
- Download statistics
- Tag and style distributions
- Category-specific metrics (trigger words, inpainting, etc.)

Statistics are cached with TTL (default 300s) and automatically
invalidated when model data changes. Caching is skipped when
grouping is enabled.

Args:
    model_category_name: The model reference category to get statistics for.
    manager: The model reference manager (injected).
    stats_cache: The statistics cache (injected).
    group_text_models: Group text models by base name (strips quantization info).
    limit: Maximum number of models to return (for pagination).
    offset: Number of models to skip (for pagination).

Returns:
    CategoryStatistics containing all computed metrics.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if category not found, 500 if computation fails.

parameters.name: group_text_models

schema.description: Group text models by base name (strips quantization)
schema.title: Group Text Models

parameters.description: Group text models by base name (strips quantization)

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of models to return (None = all)
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of models to return (None = all)

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Number of models to skip (for pagination)
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Number of models to skip (for pagination)

get.summary: Get models merged with AI Horde runtime statistics
get.description:
Get AI Horde statistics data for models in a given category.

Combines live runtime statistics from the AI Horde API:
- Worker count, queued jobs, performance metrics, ETA
- Usage statistics (day, month, total)
- Optional worker details
- Optional per-backend variations (for text generation models)

**Caching:**
- Model reference data: cached by ModelReferenceManager (60s TTL)
- Horde API data: cached by HordeAPIIntegration (60s TTL, Redis if available)
- Merged results: computed on-demand (no caching)

Args:
    model_category_name: The model category (image_generation or text_generation).
    manager: Model reference manager dependency.
    horde_api: Horde API integration dependency.
    include_workers: Include detailed worker information for each model.
    include_backend_variations: Include per-backend statistics (aphrodite, koboldcpp) for text models.
    min_worker_count: Filter to models with at least this many workers.
    sort_by: Sort by field (worker_count, usage_total, usage_month, name).
    sort_desc: Sort in descending order (default: True).

Returns:
    JSONResponse: Dict of model_name -> enriched_model_data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if category not found, 500 if Horde API fails.

200.description: Models with runtime statistics from AI Horde

GetModelCategory.description: Get raw model reference data without statistics.

500.description: Failed to fetch Horde API data

get.summary: Get audit analysis for a model category
get.description:
Get comprehensive audit analysis for a model reference category.

Analyzes all models in the category to identify deletion risks including:
- Missing or invalid download URLs
- Non-preferred file hosts
- Missing required fields (description, baseline)
- Zero active workers
- Low or no recent usage

Returns both per-model audit information and aggregate summary statistics.
Audit results are cached (default 300s TTL) and automatically invalidated
when model data changes.

Args:
    model_category_name: The model reference category to audit.
    manager: The model reference manager (injected).
    horde_api: The Horde API integration (injected).
    audit_cache: The audit cache (injected).
    group_text_models: Group text models by base name (strips quantization info).
    preset: Optional preset filter to apply (deletion_candidates, zero_usage, etc.).
    limit: Maximum number of models to return (None = all).
    offset: Number of models to skip (for pagination).

Returns:
    CategoryAuditResponse with per-model audit info and summary.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 400 for unsupported categories or invalid preset, 404 if not found, 500 for errors.

parameters.name: group_text_models

schema.description: Group text models by base name (strips quantization)
schema.title: Group Text Models

parameters.description: Group text models by base name (strips quantization)

parameters.name: preset

schema.description: Apply preset filter to results. Valid presets: deletion_candidates, zero_usage, no_workers, missing_data, host_issues, critical, low_usage
schema.title: Preset

parameters.description: Apply preset filter to results. Valid presets: deletion_candidates, zero_usage, no_workers, missing_data, host_issues, critical, low_usage

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of models to return (None = all)
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of models to return (None = all)

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Number of models to skip (for pagination)
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Number of models to skip (for pagination)

400.description: Invalid category or unsupported category for audit

500.description: Internal server error fetching Horde API data or computing audit

get.summary: Get last update timestamp for canonical format (v2)
get.description:
Get the last update timestamp for the canonical format.

This endpoint returns the maximum last_updated timestamp across all categories
for v2 format operations. Only available when canonical_format='v2'.

Returns:
    LastUpdatedResponse with the maximum timestamp, or None if no metadata exists.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 503 if metadata is not supported or canonical_format != 'v2'.

GetAllV2Metadata.description: Get all v2 format metadata for all categories.

503.description: Service unavailable (metadata not supported or non-canonical format)

get.description:
Get the last update timestamp for a specific category (v2 format).

Args:
    model_category_name: The model reference category to get metadata for.
    manager: The model reference manager dependency.

Returns:
    CategoryLastUpdatedResponse with the timestamp, or None if no metadata exists.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 503 if metadata is not supported.
    HTTPException: 404 if category has no metadata.

GetCategoryMetadata.description: Get full metadata for this category.

404.description: Category not found or no metadata available

503.description: Service unavailable (metadata not supported)

Returns a dictionary mapping each category to its v2 format metadata.

Args:

Returns:
    Dict of category to CategoryMetadata.

Raises:
    HTTPException: 503 if metadata is not supported.

GetCategoryMetadata.description: Get metadata for a specific category.

GetLastUpdated.description: Get the most recent update timestamp across all categories.

503.description: Service unavailable (metadata not supported)

Returns:

get.summary: Get info about the legacy model reference API
get.description:
Get information about the legacy model reference API.

This is the legacy model reference API, which uses the format originally found at the
github repositories:
- https://github.com/Haidra-Org/AI-Horde-image-model-reference
- https://github.com/Haidra-Org/AI-Horde-text-model-reference

get.summary: Get all legacy model reference names
get.description:
Get all available legacy model reference category names.

Returns a list of all model categories that have legacy format references available.

get.summary: Get text generation models with optional grouping field
get.description:
Get all text generation models with optional text_model_group field.

Returns the complete legacy format JSON for text generation models.

By default, the text_model_group field is not included (legacy format).
Set include_group=true to dynamically compute and include the text_model_group
field, which contains the base model group name for grouping model variants
together (e.g., models with different quantization levels).

parameters.name: include_group

schema.description: Include text_model_group field for grouping model variants together
schema.title: Include Group

parameters.description: Include text_model_group field for grouping model variants together

has_unknown_host.description: Model has download URLs with unknown or unparseable hosts.

no_download_urls.description: Model has no download URLs, empty download list, or invalid URLs.

missing_baseline.description: Model lacks baseline information (for applicable categories).

low_usage.title: Low Usage
low_usage.description: Model has very low usage (threshold defined by LOW_USAGE_THRESHOLD constant).

DeletionRiskFlags.title: DeletionRiskFlags
DeletionRiskFlags.description:
Flags indicating potential reasons for model deletion.

Each flag represents a specific issue that might warrant model removal.
Aligned with frontend expectations for consistent presentation.

DownloadRecord.title: DownloadRecord
DownloadRecord.description: A record of a file to download for a model. Typically a ckpt file.

total_models_with_downloads.title: Total Models With Downloads
total_models_with_downloads.description: Number of models that have at least one download entry.

total_download_entries.title: Total Download Entries
total_download_entries.description: Total number of download entries across all models.

total_size_bytes.title: Total Size Bytes
total_size_bytes.description: Total size in bytes of all downloads (for models with size information).

models_with_size_info.title: Models With Size Info
models_with_size_info.description: Number of models that have size_on_disk_bytes information.

average_size_bytes.title: Average Size Bytes
average_size_bytes.description: Average size in bytes for models with size information.

GenericModelRecordConfig.title: GenericModelRecordConfig
GenericModelRecordConfig.description: Configuration for a generic model record.

GenericModelRecordMetadata.title: GenericModelRecordMetadata
GenericModelRecordMetadata.description: Metadata for a generic model record.

ImageGenerationModelRecord-Input.description: A model entry in the model reference.

ImageGenerationModelRecord-Output.description: A model entry in the model reference.

KNOWN_IMAGE_GENERATION_BASELINE.title: KNOWN_IMAGE_GENERATION_BASELINE
KNOWN_IMAGE_GENERATION_BASELINE.description: An enum of all the image generation baselines.

LegacyConfig.title: LegacyConfig
LegacyConfig.description: Typed representation of the legacy `config` payload.

LegacyConfigDownload.title: LegacyConfigDownload
LegacyConfigDownload.description: A single legacy config download entry.

LegacyConfigFile.title: LegacyConfigFile
LegacyConfigFile.description: A single legacy config file entry.

LegacyControlnetRecord-Input.description: ControlNet legacy record with category-specific normalization.

MODEL_DOMAIN.title: MODEL_DOMAIN
MODEL_DOMAIN.description: The domain of a model, i.e., what it pertains to (image, text, video, etc.).

MODEL_PURPOSE.title: MODEL_PURPOSE
MODEL_PURPOSE.description: The primary purpose of a model, for example, image generation or feature extraction.

MODEL_REFERENCE_CATEGORY.title: MODEL_REFERENCE_CATEGORY
MODEL_REFERENCE_CATEGORY.description: The categories of model reference entries.

MODEL_STYLE.title: MODEL_STYLE
MODEL_STYLE.description: An enum of all the model styles.

category.description: The category this model belongs to.

at_risk.title: At Risk
at_risk.description: True if model has any deletion risk flags.

risk_score.title: Risk Score
risk_score.description: Total number of deletion risk flags (0 = no risk).

worker_count.title: Worker Count
worker_count.description: Number of active workers serving this model.

usage_day.title: Usage Day
usage_day.description: Usage count for the past day.

usage_month.title: Usage Month
usage_month.description: Usage count for the past month.

usage_hour.title: Usage Hour
usage_hour.description: Usage count for the past hour (will be populated when alternative Horde API sources become available).

usage_minute.title: Usage Minute
usage_minute.description: Usage count for the past minute (will be populated when alternative Horde API sources become available).

usage_percentage_of_category.title: Usage Percentage Of Category
usage_percentage_of_category.description: Percentage of category's total monthly usage.

usage_trend.description: Usage trend comparing different time periods.

cost_benefit_score.title: Cost Benefit Score
cost_benefit_score.description: Cost-benefit metric: usage per GB (usage_month / size_gb). Only for models with size info.

is_critical.title: Is Critical
is_critical.description:
Determine if model is in critical state.

Critical = zero month usage AND no active workers.

Returns:
    True if model meets critical criteria.

has_warning.title: Has Warning
has_warning.description:
Determine if model has warning-level issues.

Warnings include host-related issues or download problems.

Returns:
    True if model has warning-level flags.

ModelAuditInfo.title: ModelAuditInfo
ModelAuditInfo.description:
Audit information for a single model.

Contains model metadata along with deletion risk assessment and usage statistics.

ModelClassification.title: ModelClassification
ModelClassification.description:
Contains specific information about how to categorize a model.

This includes the model's `MODEL_DOMAIN` and `MODEL_PURPOSE`.

OperationType.title: OperationType
OperationType.description: Type of CRUD operation performed on model references.

min_params.title: Min Params
min_params.description: Minimum parameter count for this bucket (None for open-ended ranges).

max_params.title: Max Params
max_params.description: Maximum parameter count for this bucket (None for open-ended ranges like '100B+').

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of models in this parameter bucket.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: Percentage of total models in this bucket.

ParameterBucketStats.title: ParameterBucketStats
ParameterBucketStats.description:
Statistics about parameter count buckets for text generation models.

Used to group models by parameter size ranges for analysis.

ReplicateMode.title: ReplicateMode
ReplicateMode.description: Indicates if copies of the model reference are canonical or replicated.

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of models with this tag/style.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: Percentage of total models with this tag/style.

TagStats.title: TagStats
TagStats.description: Statistics about model tags or styles.

TextGenerationModelRecord-Input.title: TextGenerationModelRecord
TextGenerationModelRecord-Input.description: A text generation model entry in the model reference.

TextGenerationModelRecord-Output.title: TextGenerationModelRecord
TextGenerationModelRecord-Output.description: A text generation model entry in the model reference.

day_to_month_ratio.title: Day To Month Ratio
day_to_month_ratio.description: Ratio of day usage to month usage (day/month). None if month usage is zero.

month_to_total_ratio.title: Month To Total Ratio
month_to_total_ratio.description: Ratio of month usage to total usage (month/total). None if total usage is zero.

UsageTrend.title: UsageTrend
UsageTrend.description:
Usage trend metrics comparing different time periods.

Ratios help identify model momentum and activity patterns.
